inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: critical sized wound defects (50 sq cm or greater)

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: His physical exam and lab studies were normal otherwise

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: He didn't use ant topical ointment on the lesion and has no positive history for any underlying disease such as DM.

notes: 41 year old man with tinea pedis infection, no underlying disease or allergy concerns.
